section.title: Manage the Number of Zope Servers

li.p: zenwebserver deploy 5 # Ensures that exactly 5 Zope servers are running.
zenwebserver deploy +1 # Deploys one additional Zope server, regardless of the current number.
zenwebserver deploy -3 # Destroys up to 3 Zope servers (as long as the minimum of 1 is maintained).

section.title: Manage the Server Pool
section.p: Detaching a target is useful when you want to isolate a Zope server and access it via its direct port to ensure that your requests are the only ones being handled by that server.
